Comment: Mandy Campbell is an entry-level Bootcamp Instructor with experience in assisting clients to reach tough fitness goals. She has a Bachelor's Degree in Exercise Science and is currently pursuing it at Concordia University. Mandy has worked as a Certified Bootcamp Instructor at Dominist Fitness Datteln from Jan 2019 to Jul 2021, where she ran daily tasks, performed personalized fitness assessments for clients, and exceeded sales goals. She also worked as a Bootcamp Instructor at Curves Gym Ponta Porã in Jul 2021. Mandy has expertise in Cardio Training, Fitness Routines, HIIT, Client Assessments, and Health & Safety. She has strong communication skills, active listening abilities, and is known for her positive interactions with clients. Mandy is also certified in Advanced First Aid, CrossFit Level 1 Instructor, and Coach’s Prep. With her passion for fitness and leadership skills, Mandy would be a great fit for roles such as Fitness Instructor, Personal Trainer, or Group Exercise Instructor.
